description: This file defines the AppRouter class which manages named route registration and navigation for a Flutter app. It specifies route names, a route map for static routes, and an onGenerateRoute method for dynamic route handling, especially for detailed recipe views. It also declares a class for route arguments and multiple placeholder widget classes used within the routing process.

classes.name: AppRouter
classes.description: A centralized, typed routing registry defining route names, static route map, and dynamic route generator for the Flutter app.

classes.name: RecipeDetailArgs
classes.description: A class encapsulating arguments for navigating to the recipe detail screen, including optional recipe ID and Recipe object.

classes.name: _SearchPlaceholder
classes.description: A placeholder widget representing the search screen.

classes.name: _FavoritesPlaceholder
classes.description: A placeholder widget representing the favorites screen.

classes.name: _DetailPlaceholder
classes.description: A placeholder widget for the recipe detail screen, displaying recipe title info.

classes.name: _InvalidArgsPlaceholder
classes.description: A widget displayed when invalid arguments are supplied for a route.

methods.name: routes
methods.description: Returns a map of static route names to their respective widget builders.

methods.name: onGenerateRoute
methods.description: A route factory handling dynamic route creation, especially for routes requiring arguments like '/detail'.
